body_html:
I don't have sudo permission, so updating or installing GLIBC is not possible. I tried extracting libc6 from debian package and set the path in LD_PRELOAD but it's not using that instead it always point to /lib64/libc.so.6(ImportError: /lib64/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.17' not found) but my LD_PRELOAD is defined as /home/hpc/pr63so/ga93yih2/lib/libc.so.6

The reason is because LD_PRELOAD is not loading properly, am getting following error message

ERROR: ld.so: object '/home/hpc/pr63so/ga93yih2/lib/libc.so.6' from LD_PRELOAD cannot be preloaded: ignored.

any workaround for this?

body:
I don't have sudo permission, so updating or installing GLIBC is not possible. I tried extracting libc6 from debian package and set the path in LD_PRELOAD but it's not using that instead it always point to **/lib64/libc.so.6**(ImportError: /lib64/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.17' not found) but my LD_PRELOAD is defined as **/home/hpc/pr63so/ga93yih2/lib/libc.so.6**

The reason is because LD_PRELOAD is not loading properly, am getting following error message

ERROR: ld.so: object '/home/hpc/pr63so/ga93yih2/lib/libc.so.6' from LD_PRELOAD cannot be preloaded: ignored.

any workaround for this?
